summary: Comprehensive testing of Bio-Link Platform MVP completed. Backend APIs working at 88.9% success rate, frontend UI and integration working excellently with minor modal interaction issue.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Image upload validation rejecting test images
flaky_endpoints.impact: Avatar and cover image uploads may fail

ui_bugs.issue: Modal backdrop intercepting close button clicks

passed_tests: Tab switching in editor and public pages
Backend APIs: auth, pages, blocks, events, showcases

action_item_for_main_agent.music_api: Fix Odesli API timeout issue - consider increasing timeout or adding retry logic
action_item_for_main_agent.image_upload: Fix image upload validation - current validation is too strict for test images
action_item_for_main_agent.modal_interaction: Fix modal backdrop click interception in PageEditor block creation modal
